title: Urban and Remote cheMistry modELLing with the new chemical mechanism URMELL: part I gas-phase mechanism development
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,164-189
DOI: 10.1039/D3EA00094J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marie Luise Luttkus, Erik Hans Hoffmann, Andreas Tilgner, Ralf Wolke, Hartmut Herrmann, Ina Tegen
URMELL, the new gas-phase chemical mechanism for Urban and Remote cheMistry modELLing with a comprehensive isoprene and aromatics chemistry scheme. URMELL includes various highly oxidized molecules which enable a direct and explicit SOA treatment.
